name: Hole Back
description:
This little creature is trapped, help it pass through all the dangerous thing and back to its lovely home!

----

Arrow Keys : Move

Space : Dig hole and stay beneath dirt ( Can keep pressing )

R : Restart current level

M : Mute

----

This game is made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

It took me about 3 full days to finish. Besides audio assets, all the other content in this game are created by my own.

As an engineer, creating art asset is really a difficult task for me... Although this art style is far from beautiful, I hope it's helpful enough to illustrate my idea.

Thank you for playing my game, any advices are welcomed. : )
